RH Petrogas Limited is an independent upstream oil and gas company. The principal activities of the Company are investment holding  and oil and gas exploration and production. It has production sharing contract (PSC) in Kepala Burung PSC (Basin PSC)  Salawati Kepala Burung PSC (Island PSC) and SK331 PSC. The Kepala Burung PSC is located onshore in the Bird's Head area of West Papua in eastern Indonesia  covering an expanded area of approximately 1 030 square kilometers (km2). The Salawati PSC  covers an area of approximately 1 137 km2 both onshore and offshore. The SK331 PSC is located onshore Sarawak  which covers an area of approximately 8 963 km2. It operates SK331 PSC  through its subsidiary  RHP (Mukah) Pte Ltd.  which holds approximately 80% participating interest in the PSC. Its subsidiaries include RH Petrogas Investments Pte. Ltd.  Tri-M Technologies Inc.  Great Prime Investments Limited and Petrogas (Island) Ltd.
